The payne and sorowe of euyll maryage De conjuge non ducenda. English. Lydgate, John, 1370?-1451?
[8] p.
In Fletestrete at the sygne of the Sonne, by me wynkyn de worde, [Imprynted at London : [ca. 1530]]
Place of publication and printer's name from colophon; publication date estimated by STC. A translation by John Lydgate of: De conjuge non ducenda. In verse. With a title-page woodcut. Signatures: A⁴. Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
